# Analysis of âš¡â”‚general Discord Channel

## 1. Summary
The chat segment covers a brief update from ash about ongoing development work. Key technical highlights include: (1) Numinia team members identified and resolved connection issues in certain worlds, with fixes planned for the next release; (2) Development of webviews/iframe support is in progress; (3) New "splats" visual feature development; (4) Creation of a new channel for world discovery; (5) Discussion about better ways to share apps and updates, with hyperworld.host/marketplace suggested as a potential solution; and (6) Upcoming main branch release to incorporate AI features. Additionally, PabloFM from Numinia mentioned they're working on more scalable Hyp apps to be presented at mmerge.io. The chat also referenced a YouTube presentation by Gert-Jan Akerboom that received positive feedback.

## 2. FAQ
Q: What's a better way to share apps and updates to apps? (asked by ash) A: Unanswered, though ash suggested hyperworld.host/marketplace as one option

## 3. Help Interactions
